featured.text: When the shuttle touches the land, a drag parachute opens to steady the aircraft, get the speed right, and help the brakes on the landing-gear wheels to bring it to a complete stop. 49.
It is estimated that there are currently over 500,000 pieces of man-made trash orbiting the Earth at speeds of up to 17,500 miles per hour.
Intersections will operate in a way that cars automatically adjust their speed to cross through, while maintaining safe distances from other vehicles.
V2V works by using wireless signals to send information back and forth between cars about their location, speed and direction, so that they keep safe distances from each other.

other.text: Tim and Dom were too careless (B) nobody on the fishing ship saw them (C) the speed of the fishing ship was too fast (D) their rowboat was not strong enough 43.
Their consensus, however, is that unless the injury involves something as serious as a broken bone or a ripped muscle, moderate exercise can actually speed healing.
An extremely mild winter allowed more mosquitoes than usual to survive, while the unusually high temperatures in that scorching summer further increased their number by speeding up their life cycle.
You might speed up healing time by gently pressing a warm washcloth 20 your eyelid for 10 minutes, 3 or 4 times a day.

definition.zh_def: 速度：物體移動的快慢程度，通常以距離與時間的比率來表示。
definition.en_def: Speed: The rate at which an object moves, typically measured as the distance traveled per unit of time.
definition.example: The car increased its speed as it approached the highway.
